en.title: Elections Rs. 11ths 11
body_lines: President Anura Kumara Dissanayake has been approved by President Anura Kumara Dissanayake to allocate Rs. 11 billion for the parliamentary election.
5 billion rupees will be obtained from the Consolidated Fund to Rs.

summary_lines: Here's a summary of the text in approximately 200 characters:
"President Anura Kumara Dissanayake approves allocation of Rs. 11 billion for parliamentary elections. Rs. 5 billion will come from Consolidated Fund."
